name: The City Folk: The Game
description:
The City Folk is meant to be a thriller like dating sim, the city can be a nice place but there is always a darker spot in a place you call home. Playing on the fact that horrible things like drugs, prostitution, kidnapping and much more happen a lot around the club scene as well as how the characters in this ended up here by a matter of bad timing and chance. This game is meant to be 18+, with adult themes and harsh topics
THIS IS ONLY A DEMO
